episodes.title: How an American Cult gave birth to an iconic Indian Company
episodes.description:
The story of a mysterious hidden connection between two companies that, on the surface, have nothing to do with each other. One was born in the 1800s as an American Cult and the other as an iconic Indian Electronics company born in the late 1900s. 

This is Episode 1 of "Under The Radar" - a series that aims to uncover little-known stories from India that reveal unexpected global connections, showcasing how Indian and South Asian history, culture, and innovation have shaped our world in ways most people never realized.

A huge shoutout to the Zero1 Network by Zerodha for supporting us with the resources that it takes to make these deep-dive content pieces possible!
